edu.uw.nemo.model

Class SubGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uw.nemo.model.SubGraph

  • public class SubGraph
extends Object
    The class to hold a subgraph which can grow or shrink effectively during runtime to avoid high GC if the subgraph is created from scratch each time.
    Author:
    vartikav

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SubGraph(int size, boolean keepSorted)
      Constructs the subgraph with provided maximum number of vertices.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(int vertex)
      Add a vertex to this subgraph.
      void clear()
      Clear the subgraph by setting the vertex count to zero.
      boolean contains(int vertex)
      CHecks whether the vertex with given id is in the subgraph.
      int get(int index)
      Get the id of the vertex at the given index in this subgraph.
      int[] getSortedVertices()
      Get the list of vertices in this subgraph in sorted order.
      int[] getVertices()
      Get the list of vertices in this subgraph.
      void remove()
      Remove the last vertex from this subgraph.
      int size()
      Get the size of the subgraph.
      String toString()
      Returns the comma separated list of vertices in the graph in sorted order

    • Constructor Detail

      • SubGraph

        public SubGraph(int size,
        boolean keepSorted)
        Constructs the subgraph with provided maximum number of vertices. At this stage, the subgraph is empty with no vertex in it.
        Parameters:
        size - The maximum number of vertices that this subgraph can have.
        keepSorted - If true, will keep vertices in sorted order

    • Method Detail

      • remove

        public void remove()

        public void clear()
        Clear the subgraph by setting the vertex count to zero.

      • size

        public int size()
        Get the size of the subgraph.
        Returns:
        The number of vertices in this subgraph.

      • get

        public int get(int index)
        Get the id of the vertex at the given index in this subgraph.
        Parameters:

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int vertex)
        CHecks whether the vertex with given id is in the subgraph.
        Parameters:
        vertex - The id of the vertex to search.
        Returns:
        True, if vertex is in subgraph.
